resources.string: Oh.. There is something wrong, please try to restart me
We need permission on external storage, or the app could not work properly. Don\'t worried about privacy and security, this app is open sourced on GitHub: https://github.com/daquexian/all2download

Welcome~~ It seems that you are new to All2Download. The way to use it is so easy, turn on the switch of the folders you want to monitor, then everything is OK. This app is open sourced at https://github.com/daquexian/all2download
